version_description:
- Fix bug sometime enter to empty room and must be exit
- Fix bug can not close chat when voting in tablets
- Optimize GUI for tablets
- Optimize number of impostor

- Fix bug: Player was disabled in vote list and can't vote this player
- Optimize gameplay

- Add new maps: Temple and Mars
- Add new play mode: Play with friends
- Fix some bugs

- Balance appearance rate of impostor
- Optimize zombie number
- Upgrade SDK
